name: participantId
description: The identification code for the participant. Where the participant comes from Prolific this is the sha1 hash of their Prolific ID. Where they do not, this is the sha1 hash of their starting timestamp plus a random decimal portion

name: advisorId
description: The individual identification number of the advisor the questionnaire is about

name: afterTrial
description: The trial id of the trial immediately preceding the questionnaire. Used to derive the timepoint variable

name: timeStart
description: Timestamp of the start of the questionnaire presentation

name: timeResponseStart
description: Timestamp of the first interaction with the sliders in the questionnaire

name: timeEnd
description: Timestamp of the submission of the questionnaire responses

name: likeability
description: Extent to which the participant endorsed ‘likeable’ over ‘unlikeable’ [0,100]

name: ability
description: Extent to which the participant endorsed ‘competent’ over ‘incompetent’ [0,100]

name: benevolence
description: Extent to which the participant endorsed ‘trying to help’ over ‘not trying to help’ [0,100]

name: pid
description: A shorthand integer used for identifying a particular participant

name: adviceType
description: Advice profile of the advisor, retrieved via advisorId

name: timepoint
description: Whether the questionnaire is before (1) or after (2) the advisor has been providing advice

name: advisorName
description: Name of the advisor, retrieved via advisorId

name: advisorCategory
description: Whether the advisor is predominantly rated as black (b) or white (w) by independent raters in the Chicago Face Database
